## Things to See and Do While in Minnesota
### February 19, 2018

### X Marks the Spot!!

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
MNLatLong <- data.frame(
        lat = c(44.944831,44.981766,44.973648, 44.979455,44.884755, 44.854865, 44.908630, 44.945124,44.955093,44.921962,44.907342,44.955150),
        lng = c(-93.101097,-93.277514 ,-93.257511, -93.27619, -93.222285, -93.242215,-93.242021,-93.311179,-93.309643,-93.306161,-93.634447,-93.102233)
)
X <- makeIcon(
        iconUrl = "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/26/Disctemp-x.png",
        iconWidth = 31*215/230, iconHeight = 31,
        iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)

MNSites <- c(
        "<a href='https://www.xcelenergycenter.com/'> Xcel Center - MN Wild </a",
        "<a href='https://www.mlb.com/twins/ballpark'> Target Field - MN Twins </a",
        "<a href='https://www.usbankstadium.com/'> US Bank Stadium - MN Vikings </a",
        "<a href='https://www.targetcenter.com/'> Target Center - MN Timberwolves </a",
        "<a href='https://www.mspairport.com/'> MSP Airport </a",
        "<a href='https://www.mallofamerica.com/home'> Mall of America </a",
        "<a href='https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/lake_nokomis_park/'> Lake Nokomis </a",
        "<a href='https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/bde_maka_ska_park/'> Bde Maka Ska </a",
        "<a href='https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/lake_of_the_isles_park/'> Lake of the Isles </a",
        "<a href='https://www.minneapolisparks.org/parks__destinations/parks__lakes/lake_harriet_park/'> Lake Harriet </a" ,
        "<a href='https://www.threeriversparks.org/location/lake-minnetonka-regional-park'> Lake Minnetonka </a",
        "<a href='https://www.mnhs.org/capitol'> State Capital Building </a"
)

MNLatLong %>%
        leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addMarkers(icon = X, popup=MNSites)


```
